title: PLIP Zero Shot Classification Tool
description:
Upload images to a locally-hosted instance of the PLIP model trained on the OpenPath dataset. Image thumbnails and prediction results are stored in a browsable database. Model is intended for exploring arbitrary image classification, not for production use.

Huang, Z., Bianchi, F., Yuksekgonul, M., Montine, T. J., & Zou, J. (2023).
A visual–language foundation model for pathology image analysis using medical Twitter.
Nature Medicine, 1–10.

title: PLIP Zero Shot API Browser
description: Browseable API reference for PLIP classification endpoints
